title: NPM : Install from Git
mainDescription: Consider you have a module for which you do not know the name, but you have its github link.
We can install it by directly providing the github URL.
code: Example of installing lodash from github: npm install https://github.com/lodash/lodash

title: NPM : Install from Gist
mainDescription: Consider you have a gist which you want to add as dependency..
When you open the gist, you will see in the URL its id.
We have to use this id for installing from gist: npm i gist:<id from the url>.
In the below example I have highlighted the id of the gist.
